item.title: Poblano Stout
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: I am getting back into brewing and have made a few batches recently. I scalled down to 2.5 gallons and found that lasts about a month or more about 2 weeks. It is an ideal amount for Morgan and me as we will not get sick of any particular beer. I will however need to scale up my pipeline. Since it is winter and I can no longer enjoy the hop aroma and flavor, I have decided to start phasing into mouth feel beers for a while.
